text: Technical lead of the in-house software development team at Bike Labyrinth. Projects include porting the current b2b software to React Native, developing the Bike Labyrinth Home app, maintaining the Bike Labyrinth website and managing a team developers.

Independent software developer with a preference for web and app development or implementing AI and Machine Learning models. I am interested in jobs that require a keen eye, critical thinking and are socially responsible.
Part-time job as an educator for new developers and interns that joined Hiro. Responsibilities include mentoring and coaching the new developers and maintaining the education programme.

Reponsible for the development of several React frontend projects, including a new UI for the NPO Start CMS, a form management system for Nedap Healthcare and a voice assistant prototype for the NPO Start app. Also mentored interns from time to time.
Responsible for leading work groups for several courses such as Introduction to Linguistics, Computational Linguistics and Semantics

_text: Responsible for managing a bar, including supply, taking care of the employees, function as a short line with security and first aid and fixing immediate technical issues at several festivals and events throughout the Netherlands.
